articles.title: Bank of Canada expected to cut key rate despite mixed inflation, jobs data
articles.description: OTTAWA — Most economists expect the Bank of Canada will look past strong jobs data and signs of stubbornness on the inflation front to deliver a second consecutive interest rate cut this week. articles.title: Drake joins Vybz Kartel for historic Canadian show
articles.description: When Drake was a teenager, he'd stand outside Toronto's long-gone Escape Nightclub handing out flyers just to get inside and lose himself in Vybz Kartel's music. On Sunday night, he came full circle, recalling that memory on stage as he welcomed the dancehall star for his first-ever Canadian concert

articles.title: Scientists finally spot hidden waves powering the Sun’s corona
articles.description: Researchers have directly observed torsional Alfvén waves twisting through the Sun’s corona — magnetic waves first predicted over 80 years ago. Captured using the Daniel K. Inouye Solar Telescope, these motions could explain why the corona is millions of degrees hotter than the Sun’s surface. The fi

articles.title: Melissa strengthens to a Category 5 hurricane and is forecast to make landfall in Jamaica
articles.description: Hurricane Melissa intensified to Category 5 strength Monday as it neared Jamaica, where forecasters said it would unleash catastrophic flooding, multiple landslides and extensive infrastructure damage.
